lead_paragraph: Judge Garland is a centrist appeals court judge who is widely respected, even by Republicans.

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR, JULIE HIRSCHFELD DAVIS and GARDINER HARRIS

headline.print_headline: Obama Pick Engages Supreme Court Battle
headline.main: Obama Chooses Merrick Garland for Supreme Court

snippet: Judge Garland is a centrist appeals court judge who is widely respected, even by Republicans.
abstract: Pres Obama nominates Merrick B Garland, well-known and respected centrist appellate judge, to be 113th Supreme Court justice; Senate Republicans respond they will block consideration until next president is chosen.
